Articles.Content:
When I click on the Mac 0.25 game install, I get the following error message:

Is that just because we're all trying to hit the server at the same time?
That's exactly it MooseCannon, please try again in a few minutes
Gotcha. It seemed oddly specific; I was expecting some http failure code or something.

I have the same issue, guess I need to wait an hour or something..

Maybe squad should check out SquareSpace.com. Their servers never go down.. Many shows and podcasts have tried!
I've been waiting 2 hours after my initial download stopped halfway and corrupted the zip file.

I got thru finally.

Just 10 short hours for my NEW PURCHASE to arrive... (OMGETF?) I had KSP via steam, but decided to re-buy via Squad since it was on sale and I'd be free of Steam...

Maybe I made a mistake...?

I got thru finally.

Just 10 short hours for my NEW PURCHASE to arrive... (OMGETF?) I had KSP via steam, but decided to re-buy via Squad since it was on sale and I'd be free of Steam...

Maybe I made a mistake...?

You can move or copy KSP out of the steam directory and run it by double clicking the KSP.exe. You do not need steam to run the steam version in other words. The KSP store always gets hit hard on release day, so either update via steam today, or wait until tomorrow to download from the KSP store as it will likely work better then.

The KSP store always gets hit hard on release day, so either update via steam today, or wait until tomorrow to download from the KSP store as it will likely work better then.

Did you wait Otis? hahaha No one wants to wait for the new release.. Heck look they are already talking about 0.26, and most of us don't even have 0.25 yet.. haha

But seriously.. I am trying to wait.. I can't even get my download to start.. I know they just moved over to multiplay.co.uk but I think maybe they need a few download servers for release day.
They seriously need better servers. I've been trying to download the new update for 6 hours now.
